data.description: This is the height at which the fans will increase to full speed. In the layers below, the fan speed will gradually increase from zero to regular fan speed.
data.img_description: An overview of common cooling settings combinations, projected onto a pyramid model.
data.hints:
- Itâ€™s also possible to change this parameter by adjusting the layer number at which the fans should be on full speed. 
- Using a higher value increases the adhesion to the bed, but can also lead to oozing and a reduced print quality. Printing with the fans on full from a height of 0.5 mm is usually sufficient.
